title: Fiscal and Monetary Policy
description: Understanding how government spending and taxation (fiscal policy) and Federal Reserve actions (monetary policy) stabilize the economy and affect personal finances including employment, interest rates, and purchasing power.
learning_objectives: Explain fiscal policy tools: government spending, taxation, and budget deficits and surpluses
Explain monetary policy tools: Federal Reserve, interest rates, and money supply
Analyze how fiscal and monetary policy affect employment, inflation, and economic growth
Evaluate policy responses to recessions and inflation
Assess how fiscal and monetary policy affect personal finances

skill_builder.title: Policy Impact Simulator
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students simulate fiscal and monetary policy decisions, analyze Federal Reserve actions and their impact on borrowing and saving, evaluate government budget priorities and trade-offs, and develop informed opinions on appropriate policy responses to economic conditions.
